detectors.description:
Token.mint(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#108-113) should emit an event for: 
	- _totalSupply += amount (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#111)

Token.confiscate(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#115-126) should emit an event for: 
	- _totalSupply -= amount (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#120) 
	- _totalSupply -= balances[target] (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#122)

Owned.transferOwnership(address)._to (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#34) lacks a zero-check on :
		- newOwner = _to (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c315d8fbd6a3ac9175db82c5a20221e537116ae5_Token.sol#36)
solc-0.8.6 is not recommended for deployment
